bibl.title: Two Notes on Papyrus.
bibl.note: 1. Was re-rolling a papyrus roll an irksome and time-consuming task? - 2. Last words on the question. Was an adhesive used in the manufacture of papyrus?

bibl.title: Scritti in onore di Orsolina Montevecchi

bibl.seg: Skeat T.C., Two Notes on Papyrus.
Scritti in onore di Orsolina Montevecchi (Bologna, 1981) pp. 373-378.
1. Was re-rolling a papyrus roll an irksome and time-consuming task? - 2. Last words on the question. Was an adhesive used in the manufacture of papyrus?
